metadata.title: CVE-2020-11441 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** phpMyAdmin 5.0.2 allows CRLF injection, as demonstrated by%0D%0Astring%0D%0A inputs to login form fields causing CRLF sequences to bereflected on an error page. NOTE: the vendor states "I don't see anythingspecifically exploitable."

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
